channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-16516] Revisit the implementation of PayloadCarryingRpcController
item.description:
First, it should be an interface, the current implementation of DelegatingPayloadCarryingRpcController is weird.

Second, we need to be more careful when dealing with cancel.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Agree. Timely. It started out as something else – a CellScanner carrier. Now it is integral with actual RpcController implementation.
So let's give it another name? For example, HBaseRpcController?
Sure.
Name the interface HBaseRpcController, and the default implementation is HBaseRpcControllerImpl.

-1 overall

You forgot to add the new classes Duo Zhang

+1 Simple rename even though this is going to mess up my fat shading patch.

Add the missing file.

stack Mind taking a look at HBASE-16526 and HBASE-16531 first? I think HBASE-16516 conflicts with HBASE-16526 because they have modified the same files. We can commit them first and then rebase the patch here.

Thanks.
